mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT member_name FROM `member` m WHERE m.member_id = #{param2}) AS leaderName ,l.lightning_title ,l.lightning_status ,(select count(member_id)+1 from apply a where class_no = 1 and status = '승인' and a.idx = l.lightning_no) as member_count ,l.member_num ,l.gender ,l.food_no ,food_name ,l.eat_speed ,lightning_create ,l.job ,l.lightning_content ,l.lightning_no ,l,class_no FROM lightningList l JOIN food f ON l.food_no = f.food_no WHERE l.lightning_no = #{param1}

SELECT (SELECT member_name FROM `member` m WHERE m.member_id = #{param2}) AS leaderName ,d.dojang_title ,d.dojang_status ,(select count(member_id)+1 from apply a where class_no = 3 and status = '승인' and a.idx = d.dojang_no) as member_count ,d.people_num ,d.gender ,d.food_no ,food_name ,d.eat_speed ,d.dojang_create ,d.job ,d.dojang_content ,d.dojang_no ,d.class_no FROM dojangList d JOIN food f ON d.food_no = f.food_no WHERE d.dojang_no = #{param1}

SELECT g.groupReview_no ,g.member_id ,g.review_title ,review_date ,g.class_no FROM groupReview g
JOIN lightningList l ON l.lightning_no = g.idx AND g.class_no = 1 WHERE l.lightning_no = #{param1}
SELECT p.dojangPost_no ,p.member_id ,p.dojangPost_subject ,p.dojangPost_date ,p.dojang_no FROM dojangPost p JOIN dojangList d ON d.dojang_no = p.dojang_no WHERE p.dojang_no = #{param1}

SELECT a.class_no ,a.member_id ,a.status ,a.idx ,d.dojang_no
FROM apply a JOIN dojangList d ON a.member_id = d.leader_id WHERE a.status = "대기" AND a.class_no = 3 AND d.dojang_no = #{param1}
